issue.title: Please add pause option
issue.body:
Can you please add an option to pause the reading of an article. Sometimes I want to pause for a bit, but whenever I ask Alexa to pause, it just goes back to the beginning.
Also, if there is a way to resume from where you left off, or an ability to fast forward to a certain point (ex. Alexa skip 10 seconds), that would be awesome. Though I understand if that is technologically impossible.

issue.title: reading articles doesn't work well
issue.body:
I just did a test. I added 4 NY Times articles to My Pocket. When it opens it says i have 4 articles, and lists them all.  When I go to read 1 it works - but if i go go "next" or say "read #2" it says no other articles after reading the 1st one!

Also, if i have numerous articles (i.e. more than 10) i won't be able to remember which was is which number - would be nice if it just started by reading the headlines, and if you didn't have to mention an article number - better if you could just say "alexa read" when a headline is read to you - then say "alexa next" either in the middle or end of that article to be able to go from article to article all in a row but not be required to listen to each fully.  Let me know if these are possibities - otherwise I won't be able to use this skill. Thanks.

issue.title: Articles with sub-headlines not reading?
issue.body:
Hi,

first thanks for the amazing work.

Most articles work really well. However, some that I had imported via pocket directly would not read at all or skip the first chunk.

This one breaks completely:
https://getpocket.com/explore/item/how-to-work-40-hours-in-16-7-the-simple-technique-that-gave-me-my-life-back-1291711976

This one also doesn't work:
https://medium.com/swlh/this-is-how-to-plan-a-day-94dc24135e1f

issue.title: Enable the skill for new regions like India
issue.body:
Please enable your skill for new Alexa regions like India. I am unable to enable the skill in India.
this is the error message in the amazon.com site.
You are not eligible to enable this skill due to geographical restrictions.

issue.title: reading articles doesn't work well
issue.body:
I just did a test. I added 4 NY Times articles to My Pocket. When it opens it says i have 4 articles, and lists them all.  When I go to read 1 it works - but if i go go "next" or say "read #2" it says no other articles after reading the 1st one!

Also, if i have numerous articles (i.e. more than 10) i won't be able to remember which was is which number - would be nice if it just started by reading the headlines, and if you didn't have to mention an article number - better if you could just say "alexa read" when a headline is read to you - then say "alexa next" either in the middle or end of that article to be able to go from article to article all in a row but not be required to listen to each fully.  Let me know if these are possibities - otherwise I won't be able to use this skill. Thanks.

issue.title: German Translation
issue.body: It would be great to have a German translation of the Skill. I am happy to help with translations.

issue.title: DE translation for additional actions
issue.body: Actions like unfavorite and unarchive are quite tricky to translate, but i think this should be fine now :-)

issue.title: Read the next article after finishing one
issue.body: The skill should ask whether it should keep on reading the next in list instead of exiting the skill after the archive prompt.
